page.title: 08HOUSING
page.content: OUR HOUSE - WARBANK, KESTON Warbank was built in 1973 for Mr Pursen. From the top entrance there is a 65 ft drop to the fields. IN 1973 it was bought by our family which is a joint family. All the uncles, aunts, nephews and nieces live togther as one large family. Part of our family is in Kenya and we go there in the holidays and they come here frequently. On the upper groun floor level is a Kitchen, dinning room,three bedrooms and one bathroom. On the lower ground storey is a music room where the music parties are held, which was first a gardeners room, where he kept his machin es and tools. the hard standing has been converted into a childrens stud and play area. One master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom are also downstairs.These extensions were designed by architect Horshad Patel1983
